sentences.toTurkish: Şafak yeni başlangıçların ve taze fırsatların sembolüdür
sentences.toFrench: L'aube est le symbole d'un nouveau départ et de nouvelles opportunités
sentences.toSpanish: El amanecer es un símbolo de nuevos comienzos y nuevas oportunidades.
sentences.toRussian: Рассвет – символ новых начинаний и новых возможностей.
sentences.toPortuguese: Dawn é um símbolo de novos começos e novas oportunidades

sentences.sentence: The hikers started their ascent at the break of dawn
sentences.toGerman: Die Wanderer begannen ihren Aufstieg im Morgengrauen
sentences.toTurkish: Yürüyüşçüler şafak vakti tırmanışa başladı
sentences.toFrench: Les randonneurs ont commencé leur ascension à l'aube
sentences.toSpanish: Los excursionistas iniciaron su ascenso al amanecer.
sentences.toRussian: Путешественники начали восхождение на рассвете.
sentences.toPortuguese: Os caminhantes começaram a subida ao amanhecer

sentences.sentence: The cityscape was mesmerizing as dawn approached
sentences.toGerman: Das Stadtbild war faszinierend, als die Morgendämmerung nahte
sentences.toTurkish: Şafak yaklaşırken şehir manzarası büyüleyiciydi
sentences.toFrench: Le paysage urbain était fascinant à l'approche de l'aube
sentences.toSpanish: El paisaje urbano era fascinante a medida que se acercaba el amanecer.
sentences.toRussian: Городской пейзаж завораживал с приближением рассвета
sentences.toPortuguese: A paisagem urbana era hipnotizante à medida que o amanhecer se aproximava

sentences.sentence: Birds chirped happily at the arrival of dawn
sentences.toGerman: Bei Anbruch der Morgendämmerung zwitscherten die Vögel fröhlich
sentences.toTurkish: Şafağın gelişiyle kuşlar sevinçle cıvıldıyordu
sentences.toFrench: Les oiseaux gazouillaient joyeusement à l'arrivée de l'aube
sentences.toSpanish: Los pájaros cantaban alegremente con la llegada del amanecer.
sentences.toRussian: Птицы радостно щебетали с приходом рассвета
sentences.toPortuguese: Os pássaros cantavam alegremente ao chegar o amanhecer

sentences.sentence: Dawn brings a sense of tranquility to the natural world
sentences.toGerman: Die Morgendämmerung bringt ein Gefühl der Ruhe in die Natur
sentences.toTurkish: Şafak doğal dünyaya huzur duygusu getiriyor
sentences.toFrench: L'aube apporte un sentiment de tranquillité au monde naturel
sentences.toSpanish: El amanecer trae una sensación de tranquilidad al mundo natural.
sentences.toRussian: Рассвет приносит ощущение спокойствия в мир природы.
sentences.toPortuguese: Dawn traz uma sensação de tranquilidade ao mundo natural

sentences.sentence: The sailor relied on the first light of dawn to navigate
sentences.toGerman: Der Seemann verließ sich beim Navigieren auf das erste Licht der Morgendämmerung
sentences.toTurkish: Denizci gezinmek için şafağın ilk ışıklarına güvendi
sentences.toFrench: Le marin comptait sur les premières lueurs de l'aube pour naviguer
sentences.toSpanish: El marinero confiaba en las primeras luces del amanecer para navegar
sentences.toRussian: Моряк полагался на первые лучи зари, чтобы ориентироваться.
sentences.toPortuguese: O marinheiro contou com a primeira luz do amanhecer para navegar

sentences.sentence: The nocturnal creatures retreated as dawn approached
sentences.toGerman: Die nachtaktiven Kreaturen zogen sich zurück, als die Morgendämmerung nahte
sentences.toTurkish: Gece yaratıkları şafak yaklaşırken geri çekildiler
sentences.toFrench: Les créatures nocturnes se retirèrent à l'approche de l'aube
sentences.toSpanish: Las criaturas nocturnas se retiraron cuando se acercaba el amanecer.
sentences.toRussian: Ночные существа отступили с приближением рассвета.
sentences.toPortuguese: As criaturas noturnas recuaram conforme o amanhecer se aproximava

sentences.sentence: The photographer captured the landscape bathed in the soft light of dawn
sentences.toGerman: Der Fotograf hielt die Landschaft fest, die in das sanfte Licht der Morgendämmerung getaucht war
sentences.toTurkish: Fotoğrafçı şafağın yumuşak ışığında yıkanan manzarayı yakaladı
sentences.toFrench: Le photographe a capturé le paysage baigné par la douce lumière de l'aube
sentences.toSpanish: El fotógrafo captó el paisaje bañado por la suave luz del amanecer.
sentences.toRussian: Фотограф запечатлел пейзаж, залитый мягким светом рассвета.
sentences.toPortuguese: O fotógrafo capturou a paisagem banhada pela luz suave da madrugada

sentences.sentence: Dawn is often the best time for reflection and introspection
sentences.toGerman: Die Morgendämmerung ist oft die beste Zeit zum Nachdenken und zur Selbstbeobachtung
sentences.toTurkish: Şafak genellikle derinlemesine düşünmek ve iç gözlem yapmak için en iyi zamandır
sentences.toFrench: L'aube est souvent le meilleur moment pour la réflexion et l'introspection
sentences.toSpanish: El amanecer suele ser el mejor momento para la reflexión y la introspección.
sentences.toRussian: Рассвет часто является лучшим временем для размышлений и самоанализа.
sentences.toPortuguese: O amanhecer costuma ser o melhor momento para reflexão e introspecção

sentences.sentence: The spacecraft embarked on a mission to explore distant planets
sentences.toGerman: Die Raumsonde begab sich auf eine Mission zur Erforschung ferner Planeten
sentences.toTurkish: Uzay aracı uzak gezegenleri keşfetme görevine başladı
sentences.toFrench: Le vaisseau spatial s'est lancé dans une mission d'exploration de planètes lointaines
sentences.toSpanish: La nave espacial se embarcó en una misión para explorar planetas distantes.
sentences.toRussian: Космический корабль отправился в миссию по исследованию далеких планет
sentences.toPortuguese: A espaçonave embarcou em uma missão para explorar planetas distantes

sentences.sentence: Engineers meticulously designed the spacecraft for interstellar travel
sentences.toGerman: Ingenieure haben das Raumschiff sorgfältig für interstellare Reisen konzipiert
sentences.toTurkish: Mühendisler uzay aracını yıldızlararası yolculuk için titizlikle tasarladılar
sentences.toFrench: Les ingénieurs ont méticuleusement conçu le vaisseau spatial pour les voyages interstellaires
sentences.toSpanish: Los ingenieros diseñaron meticulosamente la nave espacial para viajes interestelares.
sentences.toRussian: Инженеры тщательно спроектировали космический корабль для межзвездных путешествий
sentences.toPortuguese: Os engenheiros projetaram meticulosamente a espaçonave para viagens interestelares

sentences.sentence: Astronauts trained intensively before boarding the spacecraft
sentences.toGerman: Die Astronauten trainierten intensiv, bevor sie das Raumschiff bestiegen
sentences.toTurkish: Astronotlar uzay aracına binmeden önce yoğun bir eğitim aldı
sentences.toFrench: Les astronautes se sont entraînés intensivement avant de monter à bord du vaisseau spatial
sentences.toSpanish: Los astronautas se entrenaron intensamente antes de abordar la nave espacial.
sentences.toRussian: Астронавты интенсивно тренировались перед посадкой в ​​космический корабль
sentences.toPortuguese: Astronautas treinaram intensamente antes de embarcar na espaçonave

sentences.sentence: The spacecraft successfully entered orbit around the moon
sentences.toGerman: Die Raumsonde gelangte erfolgreich in die Umlaufbahn um den Mond
sentences.toTurkish: Uzay aracı başarıyla ayın yörüngesine girdi
sentences.toFrench: Le vaisseau spatial est entré avec succès en orbite autour de la Lune
sentences.toSpanish: La nave espacial entró con éxito en órbita alrededor de la luna.
sentences.toRussian: Космический корабль успешно вышел на орбиту Луны
sentences.toPortuguese: A espaçonave entrou com sucesso em órbita ao redor da lua

sentences.sentence: Cutting-edge technology is essential for modern spacecraft
sentences.toGerman: Spitzentechnologie ist für moderne Raumfahrzeuge unerlässlich
sentences.toTurkish: Modern uzay araçları için ileri teknoloji şarttır
sentences.toFrench: Une technologie de pointe est essentielle pour les vaisseaux spatiaux modernes
sentences.toSpanish: La tecnología de punta es esencial para las naves espaciales modernas
sentences.toRussian: Передовые технологии необходимы для современных космических кораблей
sentences.toPortuguese: Tecnologia de ponta é essencial para naves espaciais modernas

sentences.sentence: Scientists study data transmitted by spacecraft to learn about our solar system
sentences.toGerman: Wissenschaftler untersuchen die von Raumfahrzeugen übermittelten Daten, um mehr über unser Sonnensystem zu erfahren
sentences.toTurkish: Bilim insanları güneş sistemimiz hakkında bilgi edinmek için uzay aracı tarafından iletilen verileri inceliyor
sentences.toFrench: Des scientifiques étudient les données transmises par les vaisseaux spatiaux pour en savoir plus sur notre système solaire
sentences.toSpanish: Los científicos estudian los datos transmitidos por naves espaciales para aprender sobre nuestro sistema solar
sentences.toRussian: Ученые изучают данные, передаваемые космическими кораблями, чтобы узнать о нашей Солнечной системе
sentences.toPortuguese: Cientistas estudam dados transmitidos por espaçonaves para aprender sobre nosso sistema solar

sentences.sentence: The spacecraft's launch was a historic moment in space exploration
sentences.toGerman: Der Start der Raumsonde war ein historischer Moment in der Weltraumforschung
sentences.toTurkish: Uzay aracının fırlatılması, uzay araştırmalarında tarihi bir an oldu
sentences.toFrench: Le lancement du vaisseau spatial a été un moment historique dans l'exploration spatiale
sentences.toSpanish: El lanzamiento de la nave espacial fue un momento histórico en la exploración espacial.
sentences.toRussian: Запуск космического корабля стал историческим моментом в освоении космоса.
sentences.toPortuguese: O lançamento da espaçonave foi um momento histórico na exploração espacial

sentences.sentence: A team of experts monitored the spacecraft's trajectory from mission control
sentences.toGerman: Ein Expertenteam überwachte die Flugbahn des Raumfahrzeugs von der Missionskontrolle aus
sentences.toTurkish: Uzmanlardan oluşan bir ekip, uzay aracının yörüngesini görev kontrolünden izledi
sentences.toFrench: Une équipe d'experts a surveillé la trajectoire du vaisseau spatial depuis le contrôle de mission
sentences.toSpanish: Un equipo de expertos siguió la trayectoria de la nave desde el control de la misión
sentences.toRussian: Группа экспертов следила за траекторией космического корабля из центра управления полетом.
sentences.toPortuguese: Uma equipe de especialistas monitorou a trajetória da espaçonave desde o controle da missão

sentences.sentence: Satellites are a type of artificial spacecraft orbiting the Earth
sentences.toGerman: Satelliten sind eine Art künstliche Raumfahrzeuge, die die Erde umkreisen
sentences.toTurkish: Uydular, Dünya'nın etrafında dönen bir tür yapay uzay aracıdır.
sentences.toFrench: Les satellites sont un type de vaisseau spatial artificiel en orbite autour de la Terre
sentences.toSpanish: Los satélites son un tipo de naves espaciales artificiales que orbitan alrededor de la Tierra.
sentences.toRussian: Спутники — это вид искусственных космических аппаратов, вращающихся вокруг Земли.
sentences.toPortuguese: Os satélites são um tipo de nave espacial artificial que orbita a Terra

sentences.sentence: The spacecraft transmitted breathtaking images of the Martian landscape
sentences.toGerman: Die Raumsonde übermittelte atemberaubende Bilder der Marslandschaft
sentences.toTurkish: Uzay aracı Mars manzarasının nefes kesici görüntülerini iletti
sentences.toFrench: Le vaisseau spatial a transmis des images époustouflantes du paysage martien
sentences.toSpanish: La nave espacial transmitió impresionantes imágenes del paisaje marciano
sentences.toRussian: Космический корабль передал захватывающие снимки марсианского пейзажа
sentences.toPortuguese: A espaçonave transmitiu imagens de tirar o fôlego da paisagem marciana

sentences.sentence: Despite her best efforts, she couldn't fail-proof the experiment
sentences.toGerman: Trotz aller Bemühungen gelang es ihr nicht, das Experiment fehlzuschlagen
sentences.toTurkish: Tüm çabalarına rağmen deneyin başarısızlıkla sonuçlanmasını sağlayamadı.
sentences.toFrench: Malgré tous ses efforts, elle n'a pas pu mener à bien l'expérience.
sentences.toSpanish: A pesar de sus mejores esfuerzos, no pudo lograr que el experimento fuera a prueba de fallos.
sentences.toRussian: Несмотря на все ее усилия, ей не удалось провалить эксперимент.
sentences.toPortuguese: Apesar de seus melhores esforços, ela não conseguiu testar o experimento

sentences.sentence: Failure is often a stepping stone to success; don't fear it
sentences.toGerman: Scheitern ist oft ein Sprungbrett zum Erfolg; Fürchte dich nicht davor
sentences.toTurkish: Başarısızlık çoğu zaman başarıya giden bir basamaktır; ondan korkma
sentences.toFrench: L’échec est souvent un tremplin vers le succès ; n'en ai pas peur
sentences.toSpanish: El fracaso es a menudo un trampolín hacia el éxito; no lo temas
sentences.toRussian: Неудача часто является ступенькой к успеху; не бойся этого
sentences.toPortuguese: O fracasso costuma ser um trampolim para o sucesso; não tenha medo

sentences.sentence: The company implemented new strategies to avoid project failure
sentences.toGerman: Das Unternehmen implementierte neue Strategien, um ein Scheitern des Projekts zu vermeiden
sentences.toTurkish: Şirket, proje başarısızlığını önlemek için yeni stratejiler uyguladı
sentences.toFrench: L'entreprise a mis en œuvre de nouvelles stratégies pour éviter l'échec du projet
sentences.toSpanish: La empresa implementó nuevas estrategias para evitar el fracaso del proyecto.
sentences.toRussian: Компания внедрила новые стратегии, чтобы избежать провала проекта
sentences.toPortuguese: A empresa implementou novas estratégias para evitar o fracasso do projeto

sentences.sentence: It's essential to learn from your failures and use them as lessons
sentences.toGerman: Es ist wichtig, aus Ihren Fehlern zu lernen und sie als Lehren zu nutzen
sentences.toTurkish: Başarısızlıklarınızdan ders alıp bunları ders olarak kullanmak çok önemlidir.
sentences.toFrench: Il est essentiel d'apprendre de ses échecs et de les utiliser comme leçons
sentences.toSpanish: Es fundamental aprender de los fracasos y utilizarlos como lecciones.
sentences.toRussian: Очень важно учиться на своих неудачах и использовать их как уроки.
sentences.toPortuguese: É essencial aprender com seus fracassos e usá-los como lições

sentences.sentence: The student was determined not to fail the final exam
sentences.toGerman: Der Student war fest entschlossen, die Abschlussprüfung nicht zu bestehen
sentences.toTurkish: Öğrenci final sınavında başarısız olmamaya kararlıydı
sentences.toFrench: L'étudiant était déterminé à ne pas échouer à l'examen final
sentences.toSpanish: El estudiante estaba decidido a no reprobar el examen final.
sentences.toRussian: Студент был полон решимости не провалить выпускной экзамен
sentences.toPortuguese: O aluno estava determinado a não ser reprovado no exame final

sentences.sentence: The team worked tirelessly to prevent a system failure
sentences.toGerman: Das Team arbeitete unermüdlich daran, einen Systemausfall zu verhindern
sentences.toTurkish: Ekip, sistem arızasını önlemek için yorulmadan çalıştı
sentences.toFrench: L'équipe a travaillé sans relâche pour éviter une panne du système
sentences.toSpanish: El equipo trabajó incansablemente para evitar una falla del sistema.
sentences.toRussian: Команда работала не покладая рук, чтобы предотвратить сбой системы.
sentences.toPortuguese: A equipe trabalhou incansavelmente para evitar uma falha no sistema

sentences.sentence: Even the most successful people have faced moments of failure
sentences.toGerman: Selbst die erfolgreichsten Menschen haben Momente des Scheiterns erlebt
sentences.toTurkish: En başarılı insanlar bile başarısızlık anlarıyla karşı karşıya kalmıştır
sentences.toFrench: Même les personnes les plus performantes ont été confrontées à des moments d’échec
sentences.toSpanish: Incluso las personas más exitosas han enfrentado momentos de fracaso.
sentences.toRussian: Даже самые успешные люди сталкивались с моментами неудач.
sentences.toPortuguese: Até as pessoas mais bem-sucedidas enfrentaram momentos de fracasso

sentences.sentence: Fear of failure should not paralyze your pursuit of goals
sentences.toGerman: Die Angst vor dem Scheitern sollte Ihr Streben nach Zielen nicht lähmen
sentences.toTurkish: Başarısızlık korkusu hedef arayışınızı felce uğratmamalı
sentences.toFrench: La peur de l’échec ne doit pas paralyser votre poursuite d’objectifs
sentences.toSpanish: El miedo al fracaso no debe paralizar la búsqueda de objetivos
sentences.toRussian: Страх неудачи не должен парализовать ваше стремление к целям.
sentences.toPortuguese: O medo do fracasso não deve paralisar sua busca por objetivos

sentences.sentence: The comedian's attempt at humor didn't fail to entertain the audience
sentences.toGerman: Der humorvolle Versuch des Komikers verfehlte es nicht, das Publikum zu unterhalten
sentences.toTurkish: Komedyenin mizah girişimi izleyenleri eğlendirdi
sentences.toFrench: La tentative d'humour du comédien n'a pas manqué de divertir le public
sentences.toSpanish: El intento de humor del comediante no dejó de entretener al público.
sentences.toRussian: Попытка комика пошутить не преминула развлечь публику
sentences.toPortuguese: A tentativa de humor do comediante não deixou de entreter o público

sentences.sentence: Resilience is the key to bouncing back after a perceived failure
sentences.toGerman: Resilienz ist der Schlüssel, um nach einem vermeintlichen Misserfolg wieder auf die Beine zu kommen
sentences.toTurkish: Dayanıklılık, algılanan bir başarısızlıktan sonra toparlanmanın anahtarıdır
sentences.toFrench: La résilience est la clé pour rebondir après un échec perçu
sentences.toSpanish: La resiliencia es la clave para recuperarse después de un fracaso percibido
sentences.toRussian: Устойчивость — ключ к восстановлению после предполагаемой неудачи
sentences.toPortuguese: Resiliência é a chave para se recuperar após um fracasso percebido

sentences.sentence: I never expected to see such a breathtaking view
sentences.toGerman: Ich hätte nie erwartet, eine solch atemberaubende Aussicht zu sehen
sentences.toTurkish: Bu kadar nefes kesici bir manzara görmeyi hiç beklemiyordum
sentences.toFrench: Je ne m'attendais pas à voir une vue aussi époustouflante
sentences.toSpanish: Nunca esperé ver una vista tan impresionante.
sentences.toRussian: Я никогда не ожидал увидеть такой захватывающий вид
sentences.toPortuguese: Eu nunca esperei ver uma vista tão deslumbrante

sentences.sentence: She promised never to reveal the secret to anyone
sentences.toGerman: Sie versprach, das Geheimnis niemals jemandem zu verraten
sentences.toTurkish: Sırrını asla kimseye açıklamayacağına söz verdi
sentences.toFrench: Elle a promis de ne jamais révéler le secret à personne
sentences.toSpanish: Ella prometió nunca revelar el secreto a nadie.
sentences.toRussian: Она пообещала никогда никому не раскрывать тайну
sentences.toPortuguese: Ela prometeu nunca revelar o segredo a ninguém

sentences.sentence: Never have I encountered such a challenging puzzle
sentences.toGerman: Ich habe noch nie ein so herausforderndes Rätsel erlebt
sentences.toTurkish: Hiç bu kadar zorlu bir bulmacayla karşılaşmamıştım
sentences.toFrench: Je n'ai jamais rencontré un casse-tête aussi difficile
sentences.toSpanish: Nunca me había encontrado con un rompecabezas tan desafiante.
sentences.toRussian: Никогда еще я не сталкивался с такой сложной головоломкой
sentences.toPortuguese: Nunca encontrei um quebra-cabeça tão desafiador

sentences.sentence: I will never forget the kindness you showed me
sentences.toGerman: Ich werde nie die Freundlichkeit vergessen, die du mir entgegengebracht hast
sentences.toTurkish: Bana gösterdiğin nezaketi asla unutmayacağım
sentences.toFrench: Je n'oublierai jamais la gentillesse que tu m'as montrée
sentences.toSpanish: Nunca olvidaré la amabilidad que me mostraste.
sentences.toRussian: Я никогда не забуду доброту, которую ты мне оказал
sentences.toPortuguese: Eu nunca esquecerei a gentileza que você me mostrou

sentences.sentence: The old house never failed to evoke a sense of nostalgia
sentences.toGerman: Das alte Haus löste stets ein Gefühl der Nostalgie aus
sentences.toTurkish: Eski ev nostalji duygusunu uyandırmakta asla başarısız olmadı
sentences.toFrench: La vieille maison n'a jamais manqué d'évoquer un sentiment de nostalgie
sentences.toSpanish: La antigua casa nunca dejaba de evocar una sensación de nostalgia.
sentences.toRussian: Старый дом всегда вызывал чувство ностальгии.
sentences.toPortuguese: A velha casa nunca deixou de evocar uma sensação de nostalgia

sentences.sentence: Some things are better left unsaid, never to be mentioned again
sentences.toGerman: Manche Dinge sollte man besser unausgesprochen lassen und nie wieder erwähnen
sentences.toTurkish: Bazı şeylerin söylenmemesi, bir daha asla bahsedilmemesi daha iyidir
sentences.toFrench: Il est préférable de ne pas dire certaines choses pour ne plus jamais les mentionner.
sentences.toSpanish: Algunas cosas es mejor no decirlas y no volver a mencionarlas nunca más.
sentences.toRussian: Некоторые вещи лучше оставить невысказанными и никогда больше не упоминать об этом.
sentences.toPortuguese: Algumas coisas é melhor não serem ditas, para nunca mais serem mencionadas

sentences.sentence: The cat never strays far from its cozy home
sentences.toGerman: Die Katze entfernt sich nie weit von ihrem gemütlichen Zuhause
sentences.toTurkish: Kedi rahat evinden asla uzaklaşmaz
sentences.toFrench: Le chat ne s'éloigne jamais de sa maison douillette
sentences.toSpanish: El gato nunca se aleja de su acogedor hogar
sentences.toRussian: Кот никогда не уходит далеко от своего уютного дома
sentences.toPortuguese: O gato nunca se afasta de sua casa aconchegante

sentences.sentence: He vowed never to repeat the same mistake twice
sentences.toGerman: Er gelobte, den gleichen Fehler nie zweimal zu wiederholen
sentences.toTurkish: Aynı hatayı asla iki kez tekrarlamayacağına yemin etti
sentences.toFrench: Il a juré de ne jamais répéter deux fois la même erreur
sentences.toSpanish: Prometió no volver a repetir el mismo error dos veces
sentences.toRussian: Он поклялся никогда не повторять одну и ту же ошибку дважды
sentences.toPortuguese: Ele jurou nunca repetir o mesmo erro duas vezes

sentences.sentence: The opportunity to travel is something I never take for granted
sentences.toGerman: Die Möglichkeit zu reisen ist für mich nie eine Selbstverständlichkeit
sentences.toTurkish: Seyahat etme fırsatı asla hafife almadığım bir şey
sentences.toFrench: La possibilité de voyager est quelque chose que je ne prends jamais pour acquis
sentences.toSpanish: La oportunidad de viajar es algo que nunca doy por sentado.
sentences.toRussian: Возможность путешествовать — это то, что я никогда не воспринимаю как нечто само собой разумеющееся.
sentences.toPortuguese: A oportunidade de viajar é algo que nunca considero garantido

sentences.sentence: Never underestimate the power of a sincere apology
sentences.toGerman: Unterschätzen Sie niemals die Kraft einer aufrichtigen Entschuldigung
sentences.toTurkish: Samimi bir özrün gücünü asla küçümsemeyin

sentences.sentence: Motorcycle safety courses teach riders essential skills for responsible riding

sentences.toRussian: Курсы по безопасности на мотоциклах обучают гонщиков необходимым навыкам ответственной езды.

sentences.sentence: The intense roller coaster ride left him with an adrenaline rush and a wide grin
sentences.toGerman: Die intensive Achterbahnfahrt hinterließ bei ihm einen Adrenalinstoß und ein breites Grinsen
sentences.toTurkish: Yoğun hız treni yolculuğu onu adrenalin patlamasına ve yüzünde geniş bir gülümsemeye bıraktı

sentences.toSpanish: El intenso viaje en la montaña rusa lo dejó con una descarga de adrenalina y una amplia sonrisa.
sentences.toRussian: Интенсивная поездка на американских горках оставила у него прилив адреналина и широкую улыбку.

sentences.sentence: Athletes often seek the thrill of competition to experience the rush of adrenaline

sentences.toRussian: Спортсмены часто ищут острых ощущений от соревнований, чтобы испытать прилив адреналина.
sentences.toPortuguese: Os atletas muitas vezes buscam a emoção da competição para experimentar a adrenalina

sentences.sentence: The expansive prairie stretched out as far as the eye could see
sentences.toGerman: Die weite Prärie erstreckte sich so weit das Auge reichte

sentences.toSpanish: La extensa pradera se extendía hasta donde alcanzaba la vista.
sentences.toRussian: Обширная прерия простиралась настолько далеко, насколько мог видеть глаз.

sentences.toRussian: Высокие травы покачивались на ветру в мирных прериях.
sentences.toPortuguese: A grama alta balançava ao vento na pacífica paisagem da pradaria

sentences.sentence: Bison roamed freely on the vast prairie, creating a scene of natural beauty

sentences.toRussian: Бизоны свободно бродили по бескрайним прериям, создавая пейзажи природной красоты.

sentences.sentence: The prairie ecosystem is home to diverse plant and animal species

sentences.toSpanish: El ecosistema de la pradera alberga diversas especies de plantas y animales.

sentences.toSpanish: Una familia de ciervos pastaba pacíficamente en la pradera, sin ser molestados por la presencia humana.
sentences.toRussian: Семья оленей мирно паслась в прерии, не беспокоясь о присутствии человека.

sentences.sentence: The cowboy hat shielded his face from the scorching sun as he tended to the cattle

sentences.sentence: Growing up on a ranch, he developed the skills of a true cowboy at an early age

sentences.sentence: In the dusty saloon, the cowboy ordered a drink before hitting the trail again

sentences.sentence: The skydiver expertly deployed their parachute, slowing the descent after the skydive

sentences.toTurkish: Paraşütçü paraşütünü ustalıkla açarak paraşütle atlamanın ardından inişini yavaşlattı
sentences.toFrench: Le parachutiste a habilement déployé son parachute, ralentissant la descente après le saut en parachute
sentences.toSpanish: El paracaidista desplegó con destreza su paracaídas, ralentizando el descenso tras el salto.
sentences.toRussian: Парашютист умело раскрыл парашют, замедлив спуск после прыжка с парашютом.
sentences.toPortuguese: O paraquedista abriu habilmente seu pára-quedas, diminuindo a velocidade de descida após o salto de paraquedas

sentences.sentence: Spectators cheered from the ground as they witnessed the synchronized skydive display
sentences.toGerman: Die Zuschauer jubelten vom Boden aus, als sie die Vorführung des synchronisierten Fallschirmsprungs miterlebten
sentences.toTurkish: Seyirciler senkronize hava dalışı gösterisine tanık olurken yerden tezahürat yaptılar
sentences.toFrench: Les spectateurs ont applaudi depuis le sol en assistant au spectacle de saut en parachute synchronisé.
sentences.toSpanish: Los espectadores vitorearon desde el suelo al presenciar la exhibición de paracaidismo sincronizado.
sentences.toRussian: Зрители аплодировали с земли, наблюдая за синхронным прыжком с парашютом.
sentences.toPortuguese: Os espectadores aplaudiram do chão enquanto testemunhavam a exibição sincronizada do salto de paraquedas

sentences.sentence: The adrenaline junkie planned to complete a solo skydive to mark a personal milestone
sentences.toGerman: Der Adrenalin-Junkie plante, einen Solo-Fallschirmsprung zu absolvieren, um einen persönlichen Meilenstein zu markieren
sentences.toTurkish: Adrenalin bağımlısı, kişisel bir kilometre taşını işaretlemek için tek başına paraşütle atlama yapmayı planladı
sentences.toFrench: Le drogué à l'adrénaline prévoyait de réaliser un saut en parachute en solo pour marquer une étape personnelle
sentences.toSpanish: El adicto a la adrenalina planeaba realizar un paracaidismo en solitario para marcar un hito personal
sentences.toRussian: Адреналиновый наркоман планировал совершить одиночный прыжок с парашютом, чтобы отметить личную веху.
sentences.toPortuguese: O viciado em adrenalina planejou completar um salto de paraquedas solo para marcar um marco pessoal

sentences.sentence: A sense of liberation filled her as the parachute opened, concluding the skydive
sentences.toGerman: Ein Gefühl der Befreiung erfüllte sie, als sich der Fallschirm öffnete und der Fallschirmsprung endete
sentences.toTurkish: Paraşüt açılıp paraşütle atlama sona erdiğinde içini bir özgürlük duygusu doldurdu.
sentences.toFrench: Un sentiment de libération l'envahit lorsque le parachute s'ouvrait, concluant le saut en parachute.
sentences.toSpanish: Una sensación de liberación la invadió cuando el paracaídas se abrió, concluyendo el salto.
sentences.toRussian: Чувство освобождения наполнило ее, когда парашют раскрылся и завершился прыжок с парашютом.
sentences.toPortuguese: Uma sensação de libertação a encheu quando o paraquedas se abriu, concluindo o salto de paraquedas

sentences.sentence: The skydiving instructor emphasized safety protocols before the tandem skydive
sentences.toGerman: Der Fallschirmspringlehrer betonte vor dem Tandem-Fallschirmsprung die Sicherheitsprotokolle
sentences.toTurkish: Paraşütle atlama eğitmeni tandem paraşütle atlamadan önce güvenlik protokollerini vurguladı
sentences.toFrench: L'instructeur de parachutisme a insisté sur les protocoles de sécurité avant le saut en parachute tandem.
sentences.toSpanish: El instructor de paracaidismo enfatizó los protocolos de seguridad antes del salto tándem
sentences.toRussian: Инструктор по прыжкам с парашютом подчеркнул правила техники безопасности перед прыжком в тандеме.
sentences.toPortuguese: O instrutor de paraquedismo enfatizou os protocolos de segurança antes do salto tandem

sentences.sentence: A group of friends decided to commemorate their bond with a group skydive

sentences.toFrench: Un groupe d'amis a décidé de commémorer leur lien avec un saut en parachute en groupe
sentences.toSpanish: Un grupo de amigos decidió conmemorar su vínculo con un paracaidismo grupal
sentences.toRussian: Группа друзей решила отметить свою связь групповым прыжком с парашютом.
sentences.toPortuguese: Um grupo de amigos decidiu comemorar seu vínculo com um salto de paraquedas em grupo

sentences.sentence: Enthusiasts often capture their entire skydive experience with helmet-mounted cameras
sentences.toGerman: Enthusiasten halten oft ihr gesamtes Fallschirmsprungerlebnis mit am Helm montierten Kameras fest

sentences.toFrench: Les passionnés capturent souvent toute leur expérience de saut en parachute avec des caméras montées sur casque
sentences.toSpanish: Los entusiastas suelen capturar toda su experiencia de paracaidismo con cámaras montadas en cascos.
sentences.toRussian: Энтузиасты часто фиксируют весь свой опыт прыжков с парашютом с помощью камер, установленных на шлемах.
sentences.toPortuguese: Os entusiastas geralmente capturam toda a sua experiência de paraquedismo com câmeras montadas em capacetes

sentences.sentence: Weather conditions play a crucial role in determining the feasibility of a skydive

sentences.toSpanish: Las condiciones climáticas juegan un papel crucial a la hora de determinar la viabilidad de un paracaidismo.
sentences.toRussian: Погодные условия играют решающую роль в определении возможности прыжка с парашютом.
sentences.toPortuguese: As condições meteorológicas desempenham um papel crucial na determinação da viabilidade de um salto de paraquedas

sentences.sentence: The solo skydiver practiced different maneuvers to enhance their skills
sentences.toGerman: Der Solo-Fallschirmspringer übte verschiedene Manöver, um seine Fähigkeiten zu verbessern

sentences.toFrench: Le parachutiste solo a pratiqué différentes manœuvres pour améliorer ses compétences
sentences.toSpanish: El paracaidista solitario practicó diferentes maniobras para potenciar sus habilidades

sentences.sentence: During the debrief, the instructor provided feedback on each participant's skydive
sentences.toGerman: Während der Nachbesprechung gab der Ausbilder Feedback zum Fallschirmsprung jedes Teilnehmers
sentences.toTurkish: Bilgilendirme sırasında eğitmen her katılımcının hava dalışı hakkında geri bildirimde bulundu.
sentences.toFrench: Lors du débriefing, l'instructeur a fourni des commentaires sur le saut en parachute de chaque participant.
sentences.toSpanish: Durante la sesión informativa, el instructor brindó comentarios sobre el paracaidismo de cada participante.
sentences.toRussian: Во время подведения итогов инструктор предоставил отзыв о прыжке с парашютом каждого участника.
sentences.toPortuguese: Durante o debrief, o instrutor forneceu feedback sobre o salto de paraquedas de cada participante.

sentences.sentence: The aerial photographer captured stunning images of the synchronized skydive team

sentences.toSpanish: El fotógrafo aéreo capturó impresionantes imágenes del equipo de paracaidismo sincronizado

sentences.toRussian: Уделение приоритетного внимания заботе о себе может улучшить общее физическое и психическое здоровье.
sentences.toPortuguese: Priorizar o autocuidado pode melhorar a saúde física e mental geral

sentences.sentence: Active listening can strengthen interpersonal relationships
sentences.toGerman: Aktives Zuhören kann zwischenmenschliche Beziehungen stärken
sentences.toTurkish: Aktif dinleme kişilerarası ilişkileri güçlendirebilir
sentences.toFrench: L'écoute active peut renforcer les relations interpersonnelles
sentences.toSpanish: La escucha activa puede fortalecer las relaciones interpersonales
sentences.toRussian: Активное слушание может укрепить межличностные отношения
sentences.toPortuguese: A escuta ativa pode fortalecer as relações interpessoais

sentences.sentence: Taking initiative can lead to opportunities that others might miss
sentences.toGerman: Initiative zu ergreifen kann zu Chancen führen, die andere möglicherweise verpassen
sentences.toTurkish: İnisiyatif almak başkalarının kaçırabileceği fırsatlara yol açabilir
sentences.toFrench: Prendre des initiatives peut conduire à des opportunités que d’autres pourraient manquer
sentences.toSpanish: Tomar la iniciativa puede generar oportunidades que otros podrían perder
sentences.toRussian: Проявление инициативы может привести к возможностям, которые другие могут упустить.
sentences.toPortuguese: Tomar iniciativa pode levar a oportunidades que outros podem perder

sentences.sentence: Practicing empathy can foster understanding and compassion
sentences.toGerman: Das Üben von Empathie kann Verständnis und Mitgefühl fördern
sentences.toTurkish: Empati yapmak anlayış ve şefkati geliştirebilir
sentences.toFrench: Pratiquer l'empathie peut favoriser la compréhension et la compassion
sentences.toSpanish: Practicar la empatía puede fomentar la comprensión y la compasión
sentences.toRussian: Практика эмпатии может способствовать пониманию и состраданию.
sentences.toPortuguese: Praticar a empatia pode promover a compreensão e a compaixão

sentences.sentence: Learning from failures can be a valuable lesson that others can apply
sentences.toGerman: Aus Fehlern zu lernen kann eine wertvolle Lektion sein, die andere anwenden können
sentences.toTurkish: Başarısızlıklardan ders almak başkalarının uygulayabileceği değerli bir ders olabilir
sentences.toFrench: Apprendre des échecs peut être une leçon précieuse que d’autres peuvent appliquer
sentences.toSpanish: Aprender de los fracasos puede ser una lección valiosa que otros pueden aplicar
sentences.toRussian: Извлечение уроков из неудач может стать ценным уроком, который смогут применить другие.
sentences.toPortuguese: Aprender com os fracassos pode ser uma lição valiosa que outros podem aplicar

sentences.sentence: Engaging in lifelong learning can keep the mind sharp and curious
sentences.toGerman: Lebenslanges Lernen kann den Geist scharf und neugierig halten
sentences.toTurkish: Yaşam boyu öğrenmeye katılmak zihni keskin ve meraklı tutabilir
sentences.toFrench: S'engager dans l'apprentissage tout au long de la vie peut garder l'esprit vif et curieux
sentences.toSpanish: Participar en el aprendizaje permanente puede mantener la mente aguda y curiosa
sentences.toRussian: Участие в непрерывном обучении может сохранить остроту ума и любознательность.
sentences.toPortuguese: O envolvimento na aprendizagem ao longo da vida pode manter a mente afiada e curiosa

sentences.sentence: Consistent effort can lead to mastery in various skills and endeavors
sentences.toGerman: Konsequente Anstrengung kann zur Beherrschung verschiedener Fähigkeiten und Unternehmungen führen
sentences.toTurkish: Tutarlı çaba, çeşitli beceri ve çabalarda ustalığa yol açabilir
sentences.toFrench: Un effort constant peut conduire à la maîtrise de diverses compétences et efforts
sentences.toSpanish: El esfuerzo constante puede conducir al dominio de diversas habilidades y esfuerzos.
sentences.toRussian: Последовательные усилия могут привести к овладению различными навыками и начинаниями.
sentences.toPortuguese: O esforço consistente pode levar ao domínio de várias habilidades e empreendimentos

sentences.sentence: Together, we can achieve more than we can individually
sentences.toGerman: Gemeinsam können wir mehr erreichen als einzeln
sentences.toTurkish: Birlikte, bireysel olarak başarabileceğimizden daha fazlasını başarabiliriz
sentences.toFrench: Ensemble, nous pouvons réaliser plus que ce que nous pouvons individuellement
sentences.toSpanish: Juntos podemos lograr más de lo que podemos lograr individualmente
sentences.toRussian: Вместе мы можем достичь большего, чем по отдельности
sentences.toPortuguese: Juntos, podemos alcançar mais do que individualmente

sentences.sentence: The challenges before us are opportunities in disguise
sentences.toGerman: Die vor uns liegenden Herausforderungen sind verborgene Chancen
sentences.toTurkish: Önümüzdeki zorluklar kılık değiştirmiş fırsatlardır
sentences.toFrench: Les défis qui nous attendent sont des opportunités déguisées
sentences.toSpanish: Los desafíos que tenemos ante nosotros son oportunidades disfrazadas
sentences.toRussian: Проблемы, стоящие перед нами, — это замаскированные возможности
sentences.toPortuguese: Os desafios que temos diante de nós são oportunidades disfarçadas

sentences.sentence: Family gatherings bring us together for moments of joy
sentences.toGerman: Familientreffen bringen uns für Momente der Freude zusammen
sentences.toTurkish: Aile toplantıları bizi neşeli anlarda bir araya getirir
sentences.toFrench: Les réunions de famille nous rassemblent pour des moments de joie
sentences.toSpanish: Las reuniones familiares nos reúnen para momentos de alegría
sentences.toRussian: Семейные встречи объединяют нас в минуты радости
sentences.toPortuguese: As reuniões familiares nos unem para momentos de alegria

sentences.sentence: The strength within us is often revealed in adversity
sentences.toGerman: Die Stärke in uns zeigt sich oft in Widrigkeiten
sentences.toTurkish: İçimizdeki güç çoğu zaman zorluklarda ortaya çıkar
sentences.toFrench: La force qui est en nous se révèle souvent dans l'adversité
sentences.toSpanish: La fuerza dentro de nosotros a menudo se revela en la adversidad.
sentences.toRussian: Сила внутри нас часто проявляется в невзгодах
sentences.toPortuguese: A força dentro de nós é muitas vezes revelada na adversidade

sentences.sentence: Our shared experiences connect us in profound ways
sentences.toGerman: Unsere gemeinsamen Erfahrungen verbinden uns auf tiefe Weise
sentences.toTurkish: Paylaşılan deneyimlerimiz bizi derin şekillerde birbirine bağlar
sentences.toFrench: Nos expériences partagées nous connectent de manière profonde
sentences.toSpanish: Nuestras experiencias compartidas nos conectan de manera profunda.
sentences.toRussian: Наш общий опыт глубоко связывает нас
sentences.toPortuguese: Nossas experiências compartilhadas nos conectam de maneiras profundas

sentences.sentence: The choices we make impact not just us but the world around us
sentences.toGerman: Die Entscheidungen, die wir treffen, wirken sich nicht nur auf uns selbst aus, sondern auch auf die Welt um uns herum
sentences.toTurkish: Yaptığımız seçimler sadece bizi değil çevremizdeki dünyayı da etkiliyor
sentences.toFrench: Les choix que nous faisons ont un impact non seulement sur nous mais sur le monde qui nous entoure
sentences.toSpanish: Las decisiones que tomamos nos impactan no sólo a nosotros sino al mundo que nos rodea.
sentences.toRussian: Выбор, который мы делаем, влияет не только на нас, но и на мир вокруг нас.
sentences.toPortuguese: As escolhas que fazemos impactam não apenas nós, mas o mundo ao nosso redor

sentences.sentence: Our dreams unite us in a common pursuit of a brighter future
sentences.toGerman: Unsere Träume vereinen uns in dem gemeinsamen Streben nach einer besseren Zukunft
sentences.toTurkish: Hayallerimiz bizi daha parlak bir geleceğin ortak arayışında birleştiriyor
sentences.toFrench: Nos rêves nous unissent dans la quête commune d’un avenir meilleur
sentences.toSpanish: Nuestros sueños nos unen en la búsqueda común de un futuro mejor
sentences.toRussian: Наши мечты объединяют нас в общем стремлении к светлому будущему
sentences.toPortuguese: Nossos sonhos nos unem na busca comum por um futuro melhor

sentences.sentence: Compassion binds us together in times of need
sentences.toGerman: Mitgefühl verbindet uns in Zeiten der Not
sentences.toTurkish: Şefkat bizi ihtiyaç anında birbirimize bağlar
sentences.toFrench: La compassion nous unit en cas de besoin
sentences.toSpanish: La compasión nos une en tiempos de necesidad
sentences.toRussian: Сострадание объединяет нас в трудную минуту
sentences.toPortuguese: A compaixão nos une em momentos de necessidade

sentences.sentence: Challenges may test us, but they also make us stronger
sentences.toGerman: Herausforderungen können uns auf die Probe stellen, aber sie machen uns auch stärker
sentences.toTurkish: Zorluklar bizi sınayabilir ama aynı zamanda bizi daha da güçlendirir
sentences.toFrench: Les défis peuvent nous mettre à l’épreuve, mais ils nous rendent aussi plus forts
sentences.toSpanish: Los desafíos pueden ponernos a prueba, pero también nos hacen más fuertes
sentences.toRussian: Проблемы могут испытывать нас, но они также делают нас сильнее.
sentences.toPortuguese: Os desafios podem nos testar, mas também nos tornam mais fortes

sentences.sentence: The beauty around us is a reminder of life's wonders
sentences.toGerman: Die Schönheit um uns herum ist eine Erinnerung an die Wunder des Lebens
sentences.toTurkish: Çevremizdeki güzellikler hayatın harikalarını hatırlatır
sentences.toFrench: La beauté qui nous entoure nous rappelle les merveilles de la vie
sentences.toSpanish: La belleza que nos rodea es un recordatorio de las maravillas de la vida.
sentences.toRussian: Красота вокруг нас – напоминание о чудесах жизни
sentences.toPortuguese: A beleza que nos rodeia é uma lembrança das maravilhas da vida

sentences.sentence: The decisions we make shape the legacy we leave behind for future generations
sentences.toGerman: Die Entscheidungen, die wir treffen, prägen das Erbe, das wir künftigen Generationen hinterlassen
sentences.toTurkish: Aldığımız kararlar gelecek nesillere bırakacağımız mirası şekillendirir
sentences.toFrench: Les décisions que nous prenons façonnent l’héritage que nous laissons aux générations futures.
sentences.toSpanish: Las decisiones que tomamos dan forma al legado que dejamos a las generaciones futuras.
sentences.toRussian: Решения, которые мы принимаем, формируют наследие, которое мы оставляем будущим поколениям.
sentences.toPortuguese: As decisões que tomamos moldam o legado que deixamos para as gerações futuras

sentences.sentence: Together, our collective efforts can create positive change
sentences.toGerman: Gemeinsam können unsere gemeinsamen Anstrengungen positive Veränderungen bewirken
sentences.toTurkish: Birlikte, kolektif çabalarımız olumlu değişim yaratabilir
sentences.toFrench: Ensemble, nos efforts collectifs peuvent créer un changement positif
sentences.toSpanish: Juntos, nuestros esfuerzos colectivos pueden crear un cambio positivo.
sentences.toRussian: Вместе наши коллективные усилия могут привести к позитивным изменениям.
sentences.toPortuguese: Juntos, nossos esforços coletivos podem criar mudanças positivas

sentences.sentence: The diversity among us is a source of strength and richness
sentences.toGerman: Die Vielfalt unter uns ist eine Quelle der Stärke und des Reichtums
sentences.toTurkish: Aramızdaki çeşitlilik güç ve zenginliğin kaynağıdır
sentences.toFrench: La diversité parmi nous est une source de force et de richesse
sentences.toSpanish: La diversidad entre nosotros es fuente de fortaleza y riqueza.
sentences.toRussian: Разнообразие среди нас является источником силы и богатства.
sentences.toPortuguese: A diversidade entre nós é fonte de força e riqueza

sentences.sentence: In times of uncertainty, our resilience guides us forward
sentences.toGerman: In Zeiten der Unsicherheit führt uns unsere Widerstandsfähigkeit voran
sentences.toTurkish: Belirsizlik zamanlarında dayanıklılığımız bizi ileriye doğru yönlendirir
sentences.toFrench: En période d’incertitude, notre résilience nous guide
sentences.toSpanish: En tiempos de incertidumbre, nuestra resiliencia nos guía hacia adelante
sentences.toRussian: Во времена неопределенности наша устойчивость ведет нас вперед
sentences.toPortuguese: Em tempos de incerteza, nossa resiliência nos guia para frente

sentences.sentence: A shared vision inspires and motivates us to strive for excellence
sentences.toGerman: Eine gemeinsame Vision inspiriert und motiviert uns, nach Exzellenz zu streben
sentences.toTurkish: Paylaşılan bir vizyon, mükemmellik için çabalamamız konusunda bize ilham verir ve motive eder
sentences.toFrench: Une vision partagée nous inspire et nous motive à viser l’excellence
sentences.toSpanish: Una visión compartida nos inspira y motiva a luchar por la excelencia.
sentences.toRussian: Общее видение вдохновляет и мотивирует нас стремиться к совершенству.
sentences.toPortuguese: Uma visão compartilhada nos inspira e motiva a buscar a excelência

sentences.sentence: Each of us plays a role in building a harmonious community
sentences.toGerman: Jeder von uns spielt eine Rolle beim Aufbau einer harmonischen Gemeinschaft
sentences.toTurkish: Her birimiz uyumlu bir topluluk oluşturmada rol oynuyoruz
sentences.toFrench: Chacun de nous joue un rôle dans la construction d’une communauté harmonieuse
sentences.toSpanish: Cada uno de nosotros desempeña un papel en la construcción de una comunidad armoniosa.
sentences.toRussian: Каждый из нас играет свою роль в построении гармоничного сообщества.
sentences.toPortuguese: Cada um de nós desempenha um papel na construção de uma comunidade harmoniosa

sentences.sentence: Our shared values create a foundation for understanding among us
sentences.toGerman: Unsere gemeinsamen Werte bilden die Grundlage für das gegenseitige Verständnis
sentences.toTurkish: Ortak değerlerimiz aramızda anlayış için bir temel oluşturur
sentences.toFrench: Nos valeurs communes créent une base de compréhension entre nous
sentences.toSpanish: Nuestros valores compartidos crean una base para el entendimiento entre nosotros.
sentences.toRussian: Наши общие ценности создают основу для взаимопонимания между нами.
sentences.toPortuguese: Nossos valores compartilhados criam uma base para o entendimento entre nós

sentences.sentence: The memories we create together stay with us forever
sentences.toGerman: Die Erinnerungen, die wir gemeinsam schaffen, bleiben für immer bei uns
sentences.toTurkish: Birlikte yarattığımız anılar sonsuza kadar bizimle kalır
sentences.toFrench: Les souvenirs que nous créons ensemble restent avec nous pour toujours
sentences.toSpanish: Los recuerdos que creamos juntos permanecen con nosotros para siempre.
sentences.toRussian: Воспоминания, которые мы создаем вместе, остаются с нами навсегда
sentences.toPortuguese: As memórias que criamos juntos ficam conosco para sempre

sentences.sentence: Our shared humanity connects us beyond borders and differences
sentences.toGerman: Unsere gemeinsame Menschlichkeit verbindet uns über Grenzen und Unterschiede hinweg
sentences.toTurkish: Ortak insanlığımız bizi sınırların ve farklılıkların ötesinde birbirine bağlıyor
sentences.toFrench: Notre humanité commune nous relie au-delà des frontières et des différences
sentences.toSpanish: Nuestra humanidad compartida nos conecta más allá de fronteras y diferencias.
sentences.toRussian: Наша общая человечность объединяет нас, несмотря на границы и различия.
sentences.toPortuguese: Nossa humanidade compartilhada nos conecta além das fronteiras e diferenças

sentences.sentence: Kindness towards others reminds us of the goodness in the world
sentences.toGerman: Freundlichkeit gegenüber anderen erinnert uns an das Gute in der Welt
sentences.toTurkish: Başkalarına karşı nezaket bize dünyadaki iyiliği hatırlatır
sentences.toFrench: La gentillesse envers les autres nous rappelle la bonté du monde
sentences.toSpanish: La bondad hacia los demás nos recuerda la bondad del mundo.
sentences.toRussian: Доброта по отношению к другим напоминает нам о добре в мире
sentences.toPortuguese: A bondade para com os outros nos lembra da bondade do mundo

sentences.sentence: Our interconnectedness calls for empathy and understanding
sentences.toGerman: Unsere Verbundenheit erfordert Empathie und Verständnis
sentences.toTurkish: Birbirimize bağlılığımız empati ve anlayış gerektirir
sentences.toFrench: Notre interdépendance appelle à l’empathie et à la compréhension
sentences.toSpanish: Nuestra interconexión exige empatía y comprensión
sentences.toRussian: Наша взаимосвязанность требует сочувствия и понимания.
sentences.toPortuguese: Nossa interconexão exige empatia e compreensão

sentences.sentence: The challenges that face us demand collective action and collaboration
sentences.toGerman: Die Herausforderungen, vor denen wir stehen, erfordern gemeinsames Handeln und Zusammenarbeit
sentences.toTurkish: Karşılaştığımız zorluklar kolektif eylem ve işbirliği gerektiriyor
sentences.toFrench: Les défis auxquels nous sommes confrontés exigent une action collective et une collaboration
sentences.toSpanish: Los desafíos que enfrentamos exigen acción colectiva y colaboración.
sentences.toRussian: Проблемы, с которыми мы сталкиваемся, требуют коллективных действий и сотрудничества.
sentences.toPortuguese: Os desafios que enfrentamos exigem ação coletiva e colaboração

sentences.sentence: The journey ahead is a shared adventure that binds us together
sentences.toGerman: Die vor uns liegende Reise ist ein gemeinsames Abenteuer, das uns verbindet
sentences.toTurkish: Önümüzdeki yolculuk bizi birbirimize bağlayan ortak bir maceradır
sentences.toFrench: Le voyage à venir est une aventure partagée qui nous lie
sentences.toSpanish: El viaje que tenemos por delante es una aventura compartida que nos une
sentences.toRussian: Предстоящее путешествие — это общее приключение, которое связывает нас вместе.
sentences.toPortuguese: A jornada que temos pela frente é uma aventura compartilhada que nos une

sentences.sentence: Reflection on the past helps us learn and grow
sentences.toGerman: Die Reflexion über die Vergangenheit hilft uns zu lernen und zu wachsen
sentences.toTurkish: Geçmişi düşünmek öğrenmemize ve büyümemize yardımcı olur
sentences.toFrench: La réflexion sur le passé nous aide à apprendre et à grandir
sentences.toSpanish: La reflexión sobre el pasado nos ayuda a aprender y crecer
sentences.toRussian: Размышления о прошлом помогают нам учиться и расти
sentences.toPortuguese: A reflexão sobre o passado nos ajuda a aprender e crescer

sentences.sentence: The support of those around us is invaluable in times of need
sentences.toGerman: Die Unterstützung unserer Mitmenschen ist in Zeiten der Not von unschätzbarem Wert
sentences.toTurkish: İhtiyaç anında etrafımızdakilerin desteği çok değerlidir
sentences.toFrench: Le soutien de ceux qui nous entourent est inestimable en cas de besoin
sentences.toSpanish: El apoyo de quienes nos rodean es invaluable en momentos de necesidad.
sentences.toRussian: Поддержка окружающих бесценна в трудную минуту
sentences.toPortuguese: O apoio daqueles que nos rodeiam é inestimável em momentos de necessidade

sentences.sentence: Our shared goals unite us in a common purpose
sentences.toGerman: Unsere gemeinsamen Ziele vereinen uns in einem gemeinsamen Ziel
sentences.toTurkish: Ortak hedeflerimiz bizi ortak bir amaçta birleştirir
sentences.toFrench: Nos objectifs communs nous unissent dans un objectif commun
sentences.toSpanish: Nuestros objetivos compartidos nos unen en un propósito común
sentences.toRussian: Наши общие цели объединяют нас в общей цели
sentences.toPortuguese: Nossos objetivos compartilhados nos unem em um propósito comum

sentences.sentence: The stories we tell connect us to our shared history
sentences.toGerman: Die Geschichten, die wir erzählen, verbinden uns mit unserer gemeinsamen Geschichte
sentences.toTurkish: Anlattığımız hikayeler bizi ortak tarihimize bağlar
sentences.toFrench: Les histoires que nous racontons nous connectent à notre histoire commune
sentences.toSpanish: Las historias que contamos nos conectan con nuestra historia compartida.
sentences.toRussian: Истории, которые мы рассказываем, связывают нас с нашей общей историей.
sentences.toPortuguese: As histórias que contamos nos conectam à nossa história compartilhada

sentences.sentence: Celebrating successes together amplifies the joy within us
sentences.toGerman: Das gemeinsame Feiern von Erfolgen verstärkt die Freude in uns
sentences.toTurkish: Başarıları birlikte kutlamak içimizdeki neşeyi artırıyor
sentences.toFrench: Célébrer les réussites ensemble amplifie la joie qui sommeille en nous
sentences.toSpanish: Celebrar los éxitos juntos amplifica la alegría dentro de nosotros
sentences.toRussian: Совместное празднование успехов усиливает радость внутри нас.
sentences.toPortuguese: Celebrar sucessos juntos amplifica a alegria dentro de nós

sentences.sentence: Facing adversity together strengthens the bonds among us
sentences.toGerman: Die gemeinsame Bewältigung von Widrigkeiten stärkt die Bindung zwischen uns
sentences.toTurkish: Zorluklarla birlikte yüzleşmek aramızdaki bağları güçlendirir
sentences.toFrench: Faire face à l’adversité ensemble renforce les liens entre nous
sentences.toSpanish: Enfrentar juntos la adversidad fortalece los lazos entre nosotros
sentences.toRussian: Совместное преодоление трудностей укрепляет связи между нами
sentences.toPortuguese: Enfrentar as adversidades juntos fortalece os laços entre nós

sentences.sentence: The love and connections we forge make us richer in spirit
sentences.toGerman: Die Liebe und die Verbindungen, die wir knüpfen, machen uns geistig reicher
sentences.toTurkish: Kurduğumuz sevgi ve bağlantılar bizi ruhen zenginleştirir
sentences.toFrench: L'amour et les liens que nous nouons nous rendent plus riches en esprit
sentences.toSpanish: El amor y las conexiones que forjamos nos hacen más ricos en espíritu.
sentences.toRussian: Любовь и связи, которые мы налаживаем, делают нас духовно богаче.
sentences.toPortuguese: O amor e as conexões que construímos nos tornam mais ricos em espírito

sentences.sentence: Let's talk about the future and what it holds for us
sentences.toGerman: Sprechen wir über die Zukunft und was sie für uns bereithält
sentences.toTurkish: Gelecek ve bizim için neler getireceği hakkında konuşalım
sentences.toFrench: Parlons de l'avenir et de ce qu'il nous réserve
sentences.toSpanish: Hablemos del futuro y de lo que nos depara
sentences.toRussian: Давайте поговорим о будущем и о том, что оно нас ждет.
sentences.toPortuguese: Vamos falar sobre o futuro e o que ele nos reserva

sentences.sentence: The novel is about a young detective solving a mysterious case
sentences.toGerman: Der Roman handelt von einem jungen Detektiv, der einen mysteriösen Fall löst
sentences.toTurkish: Roman gizemli bir vakayı çözen genç bir dedektifi konu alıyor.
sentences.toFrench: Le roman raconte l'histoire d'un jeune détective résolvant une affaire mystérieuse.
sentences.toSpanish: La novela trata sobre un joven detective que resuelve un caso misterioso.
sentences.toRussian: Роман о молодом детективе, раскрывающем загадочное дело.
sentences.toPortuguese: O romance é sobre um jovem detetive resolvendo um caso misterioso

sentences.sentence: A thoughtful discussion about climate change is essential
sentences.toGerman: Eine nachdenkliche Diskussion über den Klimawandel ist unerlässlich

sentences.toRussian: Каждый восход солнца — напоминание о красоте нового дня.

sentences.sentence: Consideration for others is a key element of good manners

sentences.toSpanish: La consideración por los demás es un elemento clave de los buenos modales

sentences.sentence: Acknowledging the efforts of others fosters a positive environment

sentences.sentence: Sometimes, the best thing to do is to do nothing at all

sentences.sentence: The choices we make today will shape what we can do tomorrow

sentences.sentence: Do what you love, and success will follow

sentences.toRussian: Делайте то, что любите, и успех придет
sentences.toPortuguese: Faça o que você ama e o sucesso o seguirá

sentences.sentence: It's essential to do your best, even in the face of challenges

sentences.sentence: If you want to change your life, you must do things differently

sentences.toPortuguese: Se você quer mudar sua vida, você deve fazer as coisas de maneira diferente

sentences.sentence: The right thing to do is not always the easiest

sentences.toTurkish: Yapılacak doğru şey her zaman en kolayı değildir

sentences.toRussian: Правильный поступок не всегда самый простой
sentences.toPortuguese: A coisa certa a fazer nem sempre é a mais fácil

sentences.sentence: The best way to learn is to do it yourself

sentences.toTurkish: Öğrenmenin en iyi yolu bunu kendin yapmaktır

sentences.toSpanish: La mejor forma de aprender es hacerlo tú mismo.
sentences.toRussian: Лучший способ научиться — делать это самостоятельно
sentences.toPortuguese: A melhor maneira de aprender é fazendo você mesmo

sentences.sentence: Taking the time to do things right is more important than speed

sentences.toTurkish: İşleri doğru yapmak için zaman ayırmak hızdan daha önemlidir
sentences.toFrench: Prendre le temps de bien faire les choses est plus important que la rapidité
sentences.toSpanish: Tomarse el tiempo para hacer las cosas bien es más importante que la velocidad
sentences.toRussian: Уделять время тому, чтобы все сделать правильно, важнее скорости.
sentences.toPortuguese: Reservar um tempo para fazer as coisas certas é mais importante que a velocidade

sentences.sentence: Sometimes, all you can do is wait and see what happens
sentences.toGerman: Manchmal kann man nur abwarten, was passiert
sentences.toTurkish: Bazen yapabileceğin tek şey beklemek ve ne olacağını görmektir
sentences.toFrench: Parfois, tout ce que vous pouvez faire, c'est attendre et voir ce qui se passe
sentences.toSpanish: A veces, todo lo que puedes hacer es esperar y ver qué pasa.
sentences.toRussian: Иногда все, что вы можете сделать, это подождать и посмотреть, что произойдет.
sentences.toPortuguese: Às vezes, tudo que você pode fazer é esperar e ver o que acontece

sentences.sentence: To succeed, you must do more than just dream

sentences.toSpanish: Para tener éxito, debes hacer más que solo soñar
sentences.toRussian: Чтобы добиться успеха, вы должны делать больше, чем просто мечтать
sentences.toPortuguese: Para ter sucesso, você deve fazer mais do que apenas sonhar

sentences.sentence: Each of us can do something to make the world a better place

sentences.toTurkish: Her birimiz dünyayı daha iyi bir yer haline getirmek için bir şeyler yapabiliriz

sentences.toSpanish: Cada uno de nosotros puede hacer algo para hacer del mundo un lugar mejor.
sentences.toRussian: Каждый из нас может сделать что-то, чтобы сделать мир лучше
sentences.toPortuguese: Cada um de nós pode fazer algo para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor

sentences.sentence: The first step to success is to do what you believe is right

sentences.toFrench: La première étape vers le succès est de faire ce que vous pensez être juste
sentences.toSpanish: El primer paso hacia el éxito es hacer lo que crees que es correcto.

sentences.sentence: It's not about what you say; it's about what you do
